title: [LFP] Oceania and NZ players
body:
Age: 17 
Sex: Male
Location: Sydney/Australia 
#LPF 

Would like to consider recruiting some excellent players that are willing to put an effort in winning and earning those rewards and overall having a fun time. 

 Answer these simple questions! {{champion:26}} 

* Sex: 
* Username: 
* Role(s): 
* Location: 
* Age:




Note: If some questions are too personal... just put N/A.

replies.body:
EDIT: all you will ready below is wrong as pointed out by Silfeon and Quizmar 

> [{quoted}](name=Snooki,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=s9Ez12Ee,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-07T05:12:11.179+0000)

> * ~~Sex~~Genre: 
> * Username: 
> * Role(s): 
> * Location: 
> * Age:

If you really need that information (why it would make any difference I don't know), I would replace Sex with Genre otherwise you may get some funny answers (i.e. "sometimes", not enough", "when my wife wants"...) 
If you actually want to know more about players sex life, then ignore my message :)... 
...but probably this is not the right website.
Actually Sex was correct. Sex refers to biological male or female whereas Gender refers to what you identify as

...and you are actually right... for some reason I though gender was more correct... 
http://www.med.monash.edu.au/gendermed/sexandgender.html

Sex: Male
Username: ADG Counter
Role(s): Mid
Location: Australia, Sydney
Age: 14

> [{quoted}](name=Snooki,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=s9Ez12Ee,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-07T05:12:11.179+0000)

> 
> Note: If some questions are too personal... just put N/A.

 * ** Sex:** Male
 
* **Username:** well it's the name shown who is posting their comment.

* **Role(s):** I'm not quite sure with roles in League of Legends. My Most played characters are {{champion:120}} {{champion:222}} and now {{champion:245}} I might consider to purchase that new "fishy" champ Tahm Kench.
* **Location: **WA, Perth
* **Age:**21

* **Other Information:** I don't play League of Legends 24/7 not even weekly, I play when i feel like playing. Not yearly but at least each month or every 2nd month, like i said i play when i feel like it.

Oh and I've never Voiped with any League of Legends people either, speaking of chat channels... 
Is there any channels created by others who got peeps to join them for great conversations and to invite peeps for matches?

If so what are the channel names?

> **great conversations** and to invite peeps for matches

Ehh... Well, "General Discussion" has quite a few people in it usually, but you probably want to stay away from the conversations (if you're talking about in-client channels). **Rarely** they can be good (a few weeks ago there was quite the interesting conversation about Tulpas) but usually it's just people insulting each other or talking about anime (if you're into that kind of thing).

* Sex: Are you coming onto me?
